00021 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter.h"
00022 #include "CHPQuantificationDetectionData.h"
00023 
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 
00026 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter(CHPQuantificationDetectionData &p)
00027 {
00028     maxProbeSetName = p.GetMaxProbeSetName();
00029         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00030         WriteHeaders();
00031 }
00032 
00033 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::~CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter()
00034 {
00035         delete writer;
00036 }
00037 
00038 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00039 {
00040         writer->WriteHeader();
00041         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00042         dataGroupWriter.WriteHeader();
00043 
00044         //int iSet=0;
00045         DataSetWriterIt beginSet;
00046         DataSetWriterIt endSet;
00047         dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriters(beginSet, endSet);
00048         if (beginSet != endSet)
00049         {
00050                 dataSetWriter = &(*beginSet);
00051                 beginSet->WriteHeader();
00052                 entryPos = SetFilePositions();
00053                 dataGroupWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00054         }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::SeekToDataSet()
00058 {
00059         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00060         dataSetWriter = &dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriter(0);
00061         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData& p)
00065 {
00066     if (maxProbeSetName == -1)
00067         dataSetWriter->Write(p.id);
00068     else
00069         dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00070         dataSetWriter->Write(p.quantification);
00071     dataSetWriter->Write(p.pvalue);
00072 }
00073 
00074 int32_t CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00075 {
00076         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00077         int32_t offset = writer->GetFilePos();
00078         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00079         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00080         return offset;
00081 }
